empty.title: No payment history found

password.title: Change Password
password.error: Failed to change password. Please try again.
password.new_different: New password must be different from current password
password.system_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
password.new_min: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.new_format: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

google_account.title: Google Account
google_account.message: You're logged in with Google, so you can't change your password here. To manage your Google account password, please visit your Google account settings.

logout.title: Log Out
logout.message: Are you sure you want to log out?

delete-job.title: Delete Job
delete-job.message: Are you sure you want to delete this job? This action cannot be undone.

close-job.title: Close Job
close-job.message: Are you sure you want to close this job? Candidates will no longer be able to apply.

accept-application.title: Accept Application
accept-application.message: Are you sure you want to accept this application? The candidate will be notified of your decision.

reject-application.title: Reject Application
reject-application.message: Are you sure you want to reject this application? The candidate will be notified of your decision.
